subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Portland is retooling after losing a star player, LaMarcus Aldridge, to San Antonio. The Spurs’ depth gives them an advantage as Aldridge returns to face his former team.
snippet: Portland is retooling after losing a star player, LaMarcus Aldridge, to San Antonio. The Spurs’ depth gives them an advantage as Aldridge returns to face his former team.
